SELECT COUNT(A.SN) AS TOT_CNT FROM MBLTN_OFFLINE_WEB A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.MBER_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.OFFLINE_SJ LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND ((A.MBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%') OR (A.OFFLINE_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%') OR (A.OFFLINE_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'))

SELECT A.SN , A.MBER_ID , A.OFFLINE_SJ AS "offlineWebSj" , A.OFFLINE_CN AS "offlineWebCn" , TO_CHAR( A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "creatDt" , TO_CHAR( A.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "updtDt" FROM MBLTN_OFFLINE_WEB A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SN = #{sn}
SELECT CASE WHEN A.CNT = 0 THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT MAX(A.SN) + 1 FROM MBLTN_OFFLINE_WEB A ) END AS SN FROM ( SELECT COUNT(SN) AS CNT FROM MBLTN_OFFLINE_WEB ) A
